de.systemagmbh.tools.server
Class ASysService

java.lang.Object
  de.systemagmbh.tools.server.ASysService
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISysComponent, ISysDevelopmentLogSwitch, ISysGlobal, ISysLogConstants, ISysService
Direct Known Subclasses:
ASysDBRService, ASysSimpleService
public abstract class ASysService
extends Object
implements ISysService, ISysLogConstants

This class is the base class of all services. It simplifies logging and provides some useful methods.

Version:
$Revision: 1.4 $
Author:
Udo Friedrich

setPropertyInfo

protected void setPropertyInfo(String[][] info)
Define information about component properties. Infos of a single property is an array of the following fields:

name | type | allowed values | description

Parameters:
info - about component properties;

buildReplyStdMessage

public CSysStdMessage buildReplyStdMessage(String app,
                                           ISysMessage msg)
Creates a reply message with all mandotory fields.

Parameters:
app - The name of the application. (The name of the server.)
msg - The ISysMessage to be sent. The CONTENTS of the StdMessage. May be null.
Returns:
the StdMessage.

buildReplyStdMessage

public CSysStdMessage buildReplyStdMessage(String app,
                                           int ecd,
                                           ISysMessage msg,
                                           String language)
Creates a reply message with all mandotory fields.

Parameters:
app - The name of the application. (The name of the server.)
ecd - The error code. This is used to get the error text.
msg - The ISysMessage to be sent. The CONTENTS of the StdMessage. May be null.
language - The language for the given ecd.
Returns:
the StdMessage.

buildReplyStdMessage

public CSysStdMessage buildReplyStdMessage(String app,
                                           ASysException e,
                                           ISysMessage msg,
                                           String language)
Creates a reply message out of a ASysException with all mandotory fields.

Parameters:
app - The name of the application. (The name of the server.)
msg - The ISysMessage to be sent. The CONTENTS of the StdMessage. May be null.
language - The language of the exception.
e - a ASysException.
Returns:
the StdMessage.

buildRequestStdMessage

public CSysStdMessage buildRequestStdMessage(String cmd,
                                             String app,
                                             ISysMessage msg)
Creates a request message.

Parameters:
cmd - The value of the CMD field.
app - The name of the application. (The name of the server.)
msg - The ISysMessage to be sent. The CONTENTS of the StdMessage. May be null.
Returns:
the StdMessage.

buildEventStdMessage

public CSysStdMessage buildEventStdMessage(String app,
                                           ISysMessage msg)
Creates a event message. CMD = 'EVENT_REPORT' is used.

Parameters:
app - The name of the application. (The name of the server.)
msg - The ISysMessage to be sent. The CONTENTS of the StdMessage. May be null.
Returns:
the StdMessage.

getMandatoryRowNumber

public int getMandatoryRowNumber(ISysTable rt)
                          throws ASysException
Get the number of rows in the specified ResultTable. If the row number is < or = zero a SysException is thrown.

Parameters:
rt - The ResultTable to search in.
Returns:
the number of rows.
Throws:
ASysException - if something goes wrong

getMandatoryField

public Object getMandatoryField(ISysTable rt,
                                String fieldName)
                         throws ASysException
Get the value of the specified column in the specified ResultTable. If the field is missing a SysException is thrown.

Parameters:
rt - The ResultTable to search in.
fieldName - The name of the column to search in.
Returns:
the value of the specified column.
Throws:
ASysException - if something goes wrong.

getOptionalField

public Object getOptionalField(ISysTable rt,
                               String fieldName)
Get the value of the specified field for the specified ResultTable.

Parameters:
rt - The CSysResultTable to search in.
fieldName - The name of the field to search for.
Returns:
the value of the specified field.

getOptionalField

public Object getOptionalField(ISysTable rt,
                               String fieldName,
                               Object defaultValue)
Get the value of the specified field for the specified ResultTable.

Parameters:
rt - The CSysResultTable to search in.
fieldName - The name of the field to search for.
defaultValue - This value is returned if the field is not available or the value is null.
Returns:
the value of the specified field.

getMandatoryField

public Object getMandatoryField(ISysMessage msg,
                                String fieldName)
                         throws ASysException
Get the value of the specified field in the specified ISysMessage. If the value is null a SysException is thrown.

Parameters:
msg - The ISysMessage to search in.
fieldName - The name of the field to search for.
Returns:
the value of the specified field.
Throws:
ASysException - if something goes wrong

getOptionalField

public Object getOptionalField(ISysMessage msg,
                               String fieldName)
Get the value of the specified field in the specified ISysMessage. If the value is null, null is returned.

Parameters:
msg - The ISysMessage to search in.
fieldName - The name of the field to search for.
Returns:
the value of the specified field.

getOptionalField

public Object getOptionalField(ISysMessage msg,
                               String fieldName,
                               Object defaultValue)
Get the value of the specified field in the specified ISysMessage. If the value is null, null is returned.

Parameters:
msg - The ISysMessage to search in.
fieldName - The name of the field to search for.
defaultValue - This value is returned if the field is not available or the value is null.
Returns:
the value of the specified field.
